title: Strawberry Chocolate Chip Muffin
ingredients: ['250g fresh strawberries, hulled and sliced', '375g plain flour', '150g caster sugar, divided', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '125ml rapeseed oil', '125g apple sauce', '170g chocolate chips (optional)']
